text:
So much going on here. 
Emissions are rising... but by less than GDP! And they would have risen by less if there was no global heating, and people weren't burning so much coal & gas to run fans & AC. But there is, and they are.

From @iea.org Global Energy Review 2025: www.iea.org/reports/glob...

"We are in the middle of a nature and climate crisis. The public and our natural world deserve better and our future resilience depends on it."

www.theguardian.com/politics/202...
